mapper.select: SELECT po.seckill_id, po.user_phone, po.create_time, po.state, sk.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", sk.name "seckill.name", sk.inventory "seckill.inventory", sk.start_time "seckill.start_time", sk.end_time "seckill.end_time", sk.create_time "seckill.create_time" FROM `pay_order` po INNER JOIN `sec_kill` sk ON po.seckill_id = sk.seckill_id WHERE po.seckill_id = #{secKillId} AND po.user_phone = #{phone}
SELECT po.seckill_id, po.user_phone, po.create_time, po.state FROM `pay_order` po WHERE po.state = #{state}
SELECT po.seckill_id, po.user_phone, po.create_time, po.state FROM `pay_order` po WHERE po.state = #{originState} AND AND TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(now(), create_time)) >= #{payedWaited}
mapper.update: UPDATE pay_order SET state = #{newState} WHERE state = #{originState} AND TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(now(), create_time)) >= #{payedWaited}
